ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a 9x13 inch baking dish, combine rice, mushrooms, celery, red bell pepper, onion soup mix, beef broth, oil, water and soy sauce.
Bake, covered, in preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is cooked.
title: One Bowl Rice
sentences: In a 9x13 inch baking dish, combine rice, mushrooms, celery, red bell pepper, onion soup mix, beef broth, oil, water and soy sauce.
Bake, covered, in preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is cooked.
